text:
Entries in chemistry have decreased a little across the UK over the last four years. The -9.0% change is broadly in line with the overall change, of -4.8%, in all A-Level entries over the last four years.

Across the UK, a broadly similar proportion of students achieved the top grades in chemistry in 2017 as did so across all A-Level subjects. A total of 40.2% of pupils achieved A*-C grades in chemistry compared to 38.2% for all subjects.
